Launch AI products faster with enterprise-grade, customizable solutions built on trusted architectures—kept up to date, easy to configure, and supported with guided setup and sample data.

Featured AI accelerators

### Multi-Agent Custom Automation Engine

Delegate complex, repetitive tasks to AI agents that act on your behalf—executing work efficiently, reducing manual effort, and ensuring results align with your organization's standards.

Products and services

Azure AI Foundry ModelsAzure AI Foundry Agent ServiceAgent FrameworkAzure Container AppsAzure Cosmos DBFoundry IQ

[Open in GitHub](https://aka.ms/CSAGoldStandards/MultiAgent)

![Multi-Agent Custom Automation Engine screenshot](https://accelerators.ms/featured/multiagent.png)

### Content Processing

Speed up document-heavy tasks using AI that understands text, tables, and charts—turning them into clear, usable data. Process claims, invoices, and contracts with precision and confidence.

Products and services

Azure AI Foundry ModelsAzure AI Content UnderstandingAzure Cosmos DBAzure Container Apps

Languages

Bicep, TypeScript, Python

[Open in GitHub](https://aka.ms/CSAGoldStandards/ContentProcessing)

![Content Processing screenshot](https://accelerators.ms/featured/contentprocessing.png)

### Conversation Knowledge Mining

Improve contact center performance with AI-powered conversation intelligence—analyzing audio and text data on a large scale to show insights, improve service, and drive smarter decisions.

Products and services

Azure AI Content UnderstandingAzure OpenAI ServiceAzure AI SearchAzure AI Agent ServiceAzure Container AppsAzure SQL Database

Python, TypeScript, Bicep

Deliver value faster with accelerators

Accelerators provide the guidance and tools you need to launch with confidence and deliver results fast.

Proven architecture

Leverage a trusted, scalable solution design based on best practices—built to ensure reliability, security, and performance, so your teams can deploy with confidence.

Quick deployment

Accelerated value

Comprehensive documentation

Costing estimate

![Proven architecture diagram](https://accelerators.ms/differentiators/solutionArch.png)

How it works

![Step 1: Browse](https://accelerators.ms/icons/Search%20Progress.png)

Step 1: BrowseBrowse available accelerators to discover ready-made solutions tailored to your customer needs.

![Step 2: Select](https://accelerators.ms/icons/Editor.png)

Step 2: SelectSelect the accelerator that best fits your business use case and adapt it to your needs using built-in configuration options.

![Step 3: Review](https://accelerators.ms/icons/Grid%20List.png)

Step 3: ReviewReview pre-requisites and costing to ensure alignment with your organizational needs.

![Step 4: Deploy](https://accelerators.ms/icons/AI%20Flash%20Sparkle.png)

Step 4: DeployUse deployment guide to launch your solution quickly and securely.

Trusted by customers

Launch AI products faster with enterprise-grade, customizable solutions built on trusted architectures—kept up to date, easy to configure, and supported with guided setup and sample data.

View Customer Stories

Always current. Fully maintained.

![Contact us](https://accelerators.ms/icons/Illustration.png)

We're here to help. Whether you're looking for answers, want to share feedback, or just have a question — [Get in touch](mailto:CSAGoldStandards@service.microsoft.com) and we'll connect with you soon.
